page.title: 01 ALL ABOUT OUR AREA
page.content: Our area is situated in the Vale of Holmsdale and just to the South of the North Downs.The scource of the River Darent which runs into the Thames near Dartford is around Westerham. The area is mainly intensively managed farmland with both arable fields and dairy herds.There is also a lot of downland which provides good walking country. The population is mainly centred on Westerham but smaller communities live in both Brasted and Sundridge.Many tourists visit the area not only to see Chartwell and Quebec House but to browse through the many antique shops which now fill much of Brasted,Westerham and Sundridge. The building of the M25 has meant the area is less bothered by through traffic.When the orbital motorway is complete,it should be even less busy.
